name: Highland View Bed and Breakfast

reviews.title: 10 out 10
reviews.text: 10 out of 10. Colin and Karen are excellent hosts who go our of their way to make you feel comfortable and welcome. They provided lots of useful information on the local area and their recommendations for restaurants etc were spot on. The rooms are spacious and tastefully decorated with a lovely outlook. The bathrooms are modern with very good fittings and lovely big bath or large shower. The breakfasts are excellent with a great choice ranging from continental to full English breakfast or scrambled eggs and smoked salmon (my favourite). Lots of little extra services are offered such as washing and wi fi. I would have no hesitation in recommending this Bed and Breakfast to anyone visiting the area - we loved staying here and would love to visit again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed two nights at the Highland View whilst on honeymoon in Scotland. The location is really good for the Glencoe, & Fort William area and the property very well appointed. We had a lovely bed room, with a giant bath and balloons to welcome us on arrival as newly weds! Our host was very good and recommended some good local resturants etc. Breakfasts were lovely looking out over the loch- all in all a very good and comfortable stay.
reviews.title: Great B & B- Good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Highland View was definitely the best B&B on our Scotland roundtrip. The rooms are extremly spacious, well equipped (Sky, ...) and very clean. The bathrooms have recently been tastefully refurbished and thus are all you could wish for.
reviews.title: The best B&B on our Scotland roundtrip

reviews.title: Great contemporary B&B with friendly owners

aka: Highland View Bed And Breakfast North Ballachulish, Scotland
description: We are nestled within the beautiful highlands of Scotland twix the dramatic scenery and unforgettable Glencoe and the outdoor capital of the highlands, Fort William. We are surrounded by some of the finest climbing, hill-walking, mountain biking, fishing and sailing areas in Britain. Highland View Bed & Breakfast offers three individually furnished, spacious en-suite rooms with kingsize, super kingsize beds, remote control satellite television, hairdryer, iron, hospitality tray etc. Two rooms overlook the stunning mountains and lochs.
